title: Survey on regretting tattoos in the U.S. 2015
summary: This statistic shows the results of a survey conducted in the country in 2017 on whether the respondents U.S. in 2015 , or not .
During the survey , some 77 % of respondents stated they U.S. in 2015 .
gold: This statistic shows the results of a survey among adult Americans who have one or more tattoos.
The survey was conducted in 2015 , asking the respondents whether they ever regret getting any of their tattoos , or not.
77 percent of respondents stated they do not regret getting any of their tattoos .
